FuncDef: The recycle remote-download acl classifier command reclaims the classifier-behavior pairs of dynamic ACL not in use on a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a classifier of dynamic ACL delivered by the RADIUS server.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 characters.

Specifies a classifier ID dynamically delivered by the RADIUS server.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 16383.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a device has classifier-behavior pairs that are not in use, to reclaim these classifier-behavior pairs, run the recycle remote-download acl classifier command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
If the specified classifier does not exist or is being used, the classifier-behavior pair with this specified classifier cannot be reclaimed.
